Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory995.jpg'}
{1: 'Untitled Map 05', 2: 'Server Time: 11:12', 4: 'Coordinates: 64.22#09.56'}
{3: 'After going through levels and beating bosses, everyone meets up with Liv in a ruins map.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hmm... I got in the connection pod, and at first it was like everyone else\'s. I talked to another Leonie and picked "Medic" as my class.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But while the system was assigning my class weapon, there was a loud crash from the ceiling. The room shook, and then that enemy showed up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'After another hit, I blacked out...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: 'I forgot to turn on the "invincible" mode when you created your character. My bad...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Anyway, I woke up here and couldn't reach the commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Remembering Leonie said the characters might be glitching, I've been super careful and avoided everyone. I made it here by picking up dropped weapons.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv turns, showing everyone the longbow on her back.'}
{3: "The longbow is based on Babylonia's standard issue design—something you all know well."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I've only used a longbow during tutorial training, so I'm not sure if I'm any good with it...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I see. Anything else that has bothered you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Even little things might matter.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh yeah, I ran into some really dangerous enemies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I saw those enemies attacking regular characters. No matter how strong an NPC was, one touch and they were dead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But those enemies have red name tags above them. If I stay away, I should be fine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Red enemies that kill you in one hit?', 3: '32', 4: "This game's way too hard.", 5: '32'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: 'Cough, those enemies were from the "Challenge Mode". They got loose by accident, honestly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'These "red-name enemies" are so dangerous that we might be able to use them to fight the rogue monsters that are attacking us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "I thought about that too, but after looking into it, it's just not going to work.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee comes out of the woods, dressed in scout gear with full camouflage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Since we split up, I've been tracking you and looking at the data on these anomalies. I've got a theory.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lee pulls a high-definition holographic projection screen from his arm armor—something Hyperreal frames don't actually have. Looks like he added it when he created his class."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I think all the characters are infected with a bug. I\'m calling it "corruption data" for now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The "corruption data" came from the game\'s underlying source code. The cause of its emergence remains unknown.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'They have only one purpose—to grow and evolve by continuously devouring external data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'From what I can tell, it\'s probably something that has to do with the "deep learning logic" in the game engine.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: 'So it\'s the "deep learning logic"? Don\'t tell me the AI\'s become self-aware...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonie', 3: "Cough, that's just Golden Age sci-fi movie stuff. It's probably not happening here. I'm overthinking it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonie', 3: 'Can you send me the surface-level details of the corruption data?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's already backed up and uploaded to the backend records.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'NPCs and enemies with this "corruption data" attack players no matter what, even if it goes against their programming.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "And now the corruption broke through the firewall and took over the logout function in the core system. If we don't fix this bug, we're stuck here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Leonie could force us out by shutting down the server, but that would really mess with Commandant's M.I.N.D.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'For now, let\'s play it safe and see if we can get rid of this "corruption data" from inside the game.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee rattles off his explanation without stopping, then passes the holographic display to you.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's everything I've got. Anything else you need?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Where's the corruption data?", 3: '64', 4: 'Where were you before?', 5: '65', 6: 'What class did you pick?', 7: '66'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't know. I don't think anyone does.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That doesn't matter. This map's a mess, with no structure at all. I didn't follow the path, I just forced my way here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee just gives a one-word answer, clearly not wanting to explain why he chose that class.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Basically, this game's got tons of problems—invisible walls, terrible power scaling, confusing directions...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And with this random "corruption data" thing, I don\'t think we can beat the game the normal way.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: "Uh, yeah, can't argue with that. Even with the rush, these are still my mistakes.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I have an idea.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Ishmael, who's been quiet the whole time, suddenly offers an idea."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Lucia, didn't you say the enemies we've fought look like the Corrupted from Earth?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah, and I think they were recreated directly from frontline combat data.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'These enemies act too uniquely to just be regular game enemies.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: 'Spot on. I used "deep learning logic" to look at frontline combat logs and made the enemies as real as I could in the game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonie', 3: 'But how does this relate to the "corruption data"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "If they're from combat records, then data on Ascendants must have been incorporated into this game as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Ishmael, are you saying we should try talking to them?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I think it's our best bet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Instead of wandering around looking for hidden enemies, teaming up with ones we can talk to is way better.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Plus, you've worked with them before, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael gives you a knowing half-smile. Even without any blame in her eyes, you feel the pressure of being completely seen through.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: 'Hold on, I found it. I\'ve got data files for someone named "Alpha".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonie', 3: "But this Alpha's just a simulated personality made from combat records. I can't promise she'll help.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'll talk her into it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "And if we have to fight, we're sure we can handle it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I also agree we should work with the Ascendants.', 3: '101', 4: "Let's try talking to them first. One step at a time.", 5: '101'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Then we should go to the map Alpha\'s most connected to. If her "deep learning logic" is working, she\'ll go somewhere she knows.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The most familiar place... I think I know where that is.', 3: '103'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like we're both thinking the same thing, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You both nod, opening the navigation menu at the same time.'}
{3: 'At the edge of the map, a familiar name lights up.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '<size=50>Special Map 07: Fort Winter</size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '-4', 10: '1'}
{1: '<size=50>Coordinates: 11.00#00.10</size>', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 10: '1'}
